Subskills.name: Viking's Carnage
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by ymir's champion.

Subskills.name: Collateral Damage
Subskills.description: Whenever the axes hit a target they send another piercing axe outwards in a straight line towards the target.

Subskills.name: Rimeforged Hatchet
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to frozen targets.

Subskills.name: Ymir's Focus
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using ymir's champion.

Subskills.name: Expanding Territory
Subskills.description: Increases the orbit radius of axes.

Subskills.name: Rapid Spinning
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of axes.

Subskills.name: Shattering Axes
Subskills.description: At the end of their duration the axes shatter into weapon shards dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Frosted Blow
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash an ice nova on hit.

Subskills.name: Rending Hatchet
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage dealt by ymir's champion.

Subskills.name: Power of Multitude
Subskills.description: Increases axes amount but damage dealt is split between axes summoned.

Subskills.name: Chainslicing Tomahawk
Subskills.description: Axes now chain through monsters and then return back to you dealing damage to monsters in its path.

Subskills.name: Scattering Battlegear
Subskills.description: Axes now fly into a random spot in a cone in front of you and start spinning on the ground dealing increased damage.
